Configuration Management

The ConfigReader class is responsible for reading and validating the application’s configuration file.

class crawler.utils.ConfigReader.ConfigReader(config_file: str = 'config.prod.ini')
get(section: str, option: str) → str | int | float | None

Retrieves the value of a specific option from a given section in the configuration file. If the value cannot be retrieved due to an error, logs the error and returns None.

Parameters:

  • section (str) – The section in the configuration file from which to retrieve the value.

  • option (str) – The option whose value is to be retrieved.

Returns:

The value of the specified option, which could be a string, integer, or float, or None if the value could not be retrieved.

Return type:

Optional[str | int | float]
